definitions.title: n.pr.[m.]
definitions.body: 12th (Babylonian) month = Feb.–Mar. (late Heb. loan-word, = Bab. A(d)-daru v. Dl:Wp. 188, cf. Al 3 93, meaning dub. perh.adâru, be darkened, eclipsed, but v. Dl:W p. 190) Es 3:7, Es 3:12, Es 8:12, Es 9:1, Es 9:15, Es 9:17, Es 9:19, Es 9:21; cf. Palm. Nab. [[אדר]] Vog:8 Eut:Nab 24.
